member.name: OCSP_CERT_ID
member.summary: The OCSP_CERT_ID structure contains information to identify a certificate in an online certificate status protocol (OCSP) request or response. This structure is used in the and structures.

member.name: OCSP_CERT_ID.HashAlgorithm
member.summary: A structure that specifies the algorithm used to create IssuerNameHash and IssuerKeyHash.

member.name: OCSP_CERT_ID.IssuerNameHash
member.summary: A CRYPT_HASH_BLOB that contains a hash of the certificate issuer subject name.

member.name: OCSP_CERT_ID.IssuerKeyHash
member.summary: A CRYPT_HASH_BLOB that contains a hash of the certificate issuer public key.

member.name: OCSP_CERT_ID.SerialNumber
member.summary: A BLOB that contains the serial number of the certificate. For more information, see the SerialNumber member description for .
